pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Multi-Wave Sampling for Efficient Chart Validation // Functionality to perform adaptive multi-wave sampling for efficient chart validation. Code allows one to define strata, adaptively sample using several types of confidence bounds for the quantity of interest (Lai's confidence bands, Bayesian credible intervals, normal confidence intervals), and sampling strategies (random sampling, stratified random sampling, Neyman's sampling, see Neyman (1934) doi:10.2307/2342192 and Neyman (1938) doi:10.1080/01621459.1938.10503378).
